name: Aprexis Health Solutions
overview: Aprexis Health Solutions is a specialized, technology-based health care company that provides development and management of integrated, evidenced-based patient support programs focused on adherence to medication management and treatment therapy. We have experience in the design and implementation of regional and national programs for multiple stakeholders in the health care continuum, including solutions for pharmacies, payers & provider groups, as well as medical device and specialty pharmaceutical makers. The Aprexis team is comprised of health care, IT and business professionals who build unique, proprietary tools and services that meet the needs of increased patient engagement, education and personalized coaching in response to emerging trends and demands in the marketplace.

funding_rounds.source_description: Aprexis finds funds for managing medicine
